extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    Level 3 and (registration in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR sub-plan or STSC Spec. Plan) and (a GPA of 2.60 in DRAM) or permission of the Department.
Corequisite    DRAM 300.

basic.description: Exploration of practical preproduction needs. Topics may include casting, staging, theatre configuration, textual alteration, rehearsal technique, period research, design approaches.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Practical Concerns in Directing
